Users Guide¶

based on <https://github.com/torfsen/python-systemd-tutorial>_

On the SBC, start the Bokeh System:

/pathto/RunFlexSpec &

Configuration¶

The best solution is to install FlexSpec as a user of the system.

$ sudo useradd -r -s /bin/false flexspec

FlexSpec1
